OOC: Hi, it is me proto, crowlord, or Hugar.  Yes, it is I, one of 
the first three founders of NBWRPG.  I have decided to rejoin NBWRPG 
for something like the 100th time.  Sorry whenever I left last time, 
I went on a vacation then got back from a vacation then had the 
computer get a virus then fix the computer like 2 hours before I went 
on another vacation then I came home and well got a girlfriend and 
lots of new friends and it was CRAZY so now after over half a year I 
finally am able to come back.  So all I need to know is what factions 
around and who incharge and what can I do.  Since I don't think it 
would be a good idea to clutter up this board with OOC chat then 
please email me at hugar_twriker@...  Please and Thankyou.
